ClivillÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©s + Cole, The 28th Street Crew, and finally, MVP. ClivillÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©s and Cole also

C+C Music Factory earned a total of 35 music industry awards worldwide, including
five Billboard Awards, five American Music Awards, and two MTV Video Music
Awards. After Cole died in January 1995, his production partner ClivillÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â©s continued to
